description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget 'BoardView' and related classes for rendering the 2048 game board, including animated tiles, background grid, and tile styling. It makes use of Flutter's widget tree, animations, theme, and provider state management to display and animate game tiles.

classes.name: BoardView
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders the 4x4 game board with animated tiles, using LayoutBuilder for responsiveness. It extracts tiles from the board and manages their layout and animation.

classes.name: _GridBackground
classes.description: Displays the static grid background of the game board with borders and rounded corners.

classes.name: _TilesLayer
classes.description: A widget that stacks animated tiles at their respective positions on the board.

classes.name: _AnimatedTile
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages spawn and merge pop animations for individual tiles.

classes.name: _TileView
classes.description: Displays the visual style of a single tile including background color and text.

classes.name: _TileColors
classes.description: Provides color schemes for tiles based on their values.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for BoardView, setting up the layout and extracting tiles.

methods.name: _extractTiles
methods.description: Extracts the list of current tiles from the board, maintaining stable order for animation.

methods.name: _triggerPop
methods.description: Triggers a quick scale pop animation, used on tile merge or spawn.

methods.name: _triggerSpawn
methods.description: Animates a new tile spawning by scaling from zero to full size.
